
Gnosis: 5

Creator: Walks-With-God

Description: An aged dog leash made from black leather, the hide from a black spiral dancer. The silver tag says, "Wyrmcrusher, If Found Please Return to Gaia". Along the collar the the words of 2 Peter 2:12 can be found, "But these, like unreasoning animals, born as creatures of instinct to be captured and killed, reviling where they have no knowledge, will in the destruction of those creatures also be destroyed."
